thread.title: The Declassified Memo and What It Means

author: Byron Tau
title: The Declassified Memo and What It Means
text:
House Republicans on Friday released a memo drawn from highly classified law-enforcement information. Hereâ€™s what you need to know:
What is this memo?
The memo alleges purported surveillance abuses that occurred during the final days of the 2016 presidential campaign directed at advisers and associates of Donald Trump. It was compiled by... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
